title: Deciphering polymer degradation chemistry via integrating new database construction into suspect screening workflow
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00212A, Paper
Phoebe Keyes, Noor Halimah, Boya Xiong
Water-soluble synthetic polymers and their environmental degradation products are overlooked but important industrial pollutants in wastewater. However, the detection of degradation products is limited to bulk solution chemistry and molecular-level...
